translation.es: No puede estar aquí. Es peligroso.

translation.en: Please, madam, you have to go and sit.
[barista in English] Hi. Can I help you?
I've heard the volcano has been very active recently.
translation.es: dicen que el volcánha estado muy activo últimamente.

translation.en: And what brings you to Stromboli?
You can't just disappear like that.
From Caro e Sara. You know?
Ah, Pietro, you painted the house!
[man in Dutch] What am I doing wrong, Sara?
-[in English] Okay, thank you very much. -E che l'acqua…
Fuck. Fuck. Fuck. Fuck. Fuck. Fuck.
Oh! Would you like to sit down?
Uh, just to rinse it off?
-Yeah, I know what you mean, but it's not. -Huh?
translation.es: Sí, entiendo, no es lo que crees.

translation.en: -I have a very strong liver. -Oh, you do?
Uh. I really have to get back.
Oh. Uh, I don't know. I've never seen it.
I bought it on eBay, uh, two years ago?
translation.es: Lo compré en eBay hace unos dos años.

translation.en: Is it in the village, your apartment?

translation.es: No, está en algún lugar de España.

translation.en: Oh, no. The group will be worried.
What about one more drink? Come on. Do as the Romans do.
translation.es: ¿Quieres un trago más? Vamos.Adonde fueres, haz lo que vieres.
La cena es a las ocho.

translation.en: That's why you need an aperitivo.
Well, what about you? Is no one waiting for you?
You have to rub it on your face, for sunburn.
translation.es: Páseselo por la cara,para la quemadura del sol.

translation.en: -[in Dutch] Ugh. Yuck. -[in English] No, no.
-My daughter was conceived on this island. -[man] Oh.
translation.es: Mi hija fue concebida en esta isla.

translation.en: I'm more of a cat person myself.
translation.es: A mí me gustan más los gatos.

translation.en: So, what's the name of your cat?
What will happen to Susie if the volcano erupts?
translation.es: ¿Qué le pasará a Susiesi el volcán entra en erupción?

translation.en: What will happen to your daughter?
I think she will be very relieved.
Uh, it's, um, it's just here.
And thank you for a lovely evening.
translation.es: Y gracias por una hermosa velada.

translation.en: [in English] Hi, did you found a bag?
And in it was a telephone, a towel, a…
translation.es: Había un teléfono, una toalla, un…

translation.en: Could you please lend me some money?
I lost my bag on the island. I don't know where it is.
translation.es: Perdí mi bolso en la isla.No sé dónde está.

translation.en: And now, I don't know where to go.
translation.es: Y ahora no sé adónde ir.

translation.en: Yeah, sorry. I don't think we've met before.
translation.es: Sí, lo siento. No nos conocemos.

translation.en: We've met on the boat. Do you not… [laughs]
-Chi cacchio sei? -[in Dutch] Calm down, man.
[in English] Keep your hands off me, yeah?
-[Sara in Dutch] Okay. -Tu mi devi pagare, devi pagare!
Calm down. I will pagare, okay? Calm down. Just calma.
I'm going to pay. I just need to find my bag, okay?
[in English] No, I don't have any money, but it's only for tonight, okay?
translation.es: No, no tengo dinero,pero es solo por esta noche, ¿sí?

translation.en: -[Sara] No, no, no, no, no! -[man] Oh, ma te ne vai o no?
Don't you touch me, I only want to use your toilet, okay?
translation.es: No me toque,solo quiero usar el baño, ¿sí?

translation.en: -Te ne devi andare… -Fuck you, Mr. Romantic Bed and Breakfast.
Oh no, Gustav. Is he okay?
Yeah, I gave him some bread, too.
I don't know where that is.
translation.es: No sé dónde es mi casa.

translation.en: [Jens] I think we have room left for Sara, don't we?
translation.es: Creo que hay lugar para Sara, ¿no?
LO SIENTO POR TODO, DE VERDAD.

translation.en: I thought you were staying with…
[woman] But I told them I was allergic to coriander.
translation.es: Les dije que era alérgica al cilantro.

translation.en: You see, it gives me heart palpitations, a little bit boring, but it does.
translation.es: Me da palpitaciones,no es gran cosa, pero lo hace.

translation.en: We always say dogs. But bastards works too.
[in English] Right. Hans, this is Sara.
And thank you so much for my bag.
It was brought back by one of the villagers.
translation.es: Lo trajo uno de los aldeanos.

translation.en: I've made you a kelp salad, Diane.
translation.es: Te hice una ensalada de algas, Diane.

translation.en: So, any chance of a glass of organic wine maybe?
translation.es: ¿Por casualidadhabrá una copa de vino orgánico?

translation.en: We would appreciate if you would refrain from the use of alcohol during your stay.
translation.es: Te agradeceríamosque no bebieras alcohol aquí.

translation.en: Jens will address the group in half an hour.
translation.es: Jens les hablará dentro de media hora.

translation.en: He had some sort of coke-induced psychosis.
translation.es: Tuvo una psicosis inducida por cocaína.

translation.en: Okay, will you keep an eye on me?
Last time I did this I fucked my husband's best friend in the…
translation.es: La última vez que hice esto,me cogí al mejor amigo de mi esposo en…

translation.en: We all have our own story.
Some of you have had problems in the relationships.
translation.es: Algunos han tenido problemascon sus relaciones.
Algunos han perdido a sus seres queridos.

translation.en: Some have had problems with drugs and alcohol.
translation.es: Otros han tenido problemascon las drogas y el alcohol.

translation.en: Now take a moment and thank yourself for coming here
translation.es: Tómense un momentoy agradézcanse por haber venido aquí

translation.en: and giving yourself the opportunity to heal.
translation.es: y haberse dado la oportunidad de sanar.

translation.en: [Jens] Sara's from Holland and she'll be joining us for a while.
translation.es: Sara es de Holanday nos acompañará un tiempo.

translation.en: -[in Dutch] Oh, great. You're Dutch too? -[in English] Yes.
[Jens] I hope you all enjoyed our last evening meal
translation.es: Espero que hayan disfrutadode la última cena

translation.en: [Jens] Guys! The next few days you will go on one of the most important journeys
translation.es: Los próximos días emprenderánuno de los viajes más importantes

translation.en: You will travel through fear, past shame, and anger.
translation.es: Viajarán a través del miedo,la vergüenza y la ira.

translation.en: And there will be moments when you just want to give up.
translation.es: Y habrá momentosen los que querrán rendirse.

translation.en: If you put your work into it,
-This is my fifth time here. -[Sara] Really?
translation.es: - Es la quinta vez que vengo.- ¿En serio?

translation.en: How wonderful. Goodnight, then. See you tomorrow.
[in English] So my son studied for half a year.
That's right, yes. And you want me to pay the full tuition?
translation.es: Así es. ¿Y quiereque pague la matrícula completa?

translation.en: Well, do you know what that makes you, you fucking bitch, a thief.
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué es usted,maldita perra? Una ladrona.

translation.en: No, no, no, I won't take that back.
Do you know how much it costs to study at Cambridge?
I had to take two jobs, I just worked like a dog.
translation.es: Tuve dos empleos, trabajé como un perro.

translation.en: Uh, how old is your son?
Um, is the air conditioning working in your room because mine…
translation.es: ¿Te anda el aire acondicionado? El mío…

translation.en: Mine seems to have been broken. Oh, my God.
translation.es: Creo que el mío se rompió. Vaya.

translation.en: So much nicer than mine, I'm going to complain to this Thandi woman.
translation.es: Es más bonita que la mía,voy a quejarme con Thandi.

translation.en: [Jens] Yes! Can you feel the vibration?
-I'm so sorry. I've got something in… -[Jens] Yeah!
It's gonna be a tough week! Yeah!
That's right. It seems like it. Yes!
You want to create an experience of life!
Just feel the joy of being alive!
Sorry, I think I, uh… I need to throw up.
translation.es: Lo siento, creo que necesito vomitar.

translation.en: It's okay, Sara. It's all good.
translation.es: Está bien, Sara. No pasa nada.

translation.en: Remember when you didn't feel any shame or fear?
translation.es: Recuerden cuando no sentíanvergüenza ni miedo.

translation.en: Now, go back to that time.
[Sara's Mom in Dutch] Oh, Sara. Sweetheart.
You look like a fashion model.
[in Dutch] Hi, it's Sofie. I never check my voicemail, so message me, please.
translation.es: Hola, soy Sofie. Nunca escucholos mensajes, así que envíame uno.

translation.en: Oh, Harold, you're an angel. Thank you.
I mean, they starve you to death and then-- Ooh, yes.
translation.es: Te matan de hambre y luego… Sí.

translation.en: They touch you with their little alien hands.
translation.es: Y luego te tocancon sus manos alienígenas.

translation.en: Uh, not me, I told them beforehand, no touching.
translation.es: A mí no, les avisé que no me tocaran.

translation.en: I think it should be avoided at all costs.
[laughs] But what about when you're in a relationship?
I think a relationship should be avoided at all costs.
translation.es: Las relacionesdeberían evitarse a toda costa.

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait. You've never been in a relationship?
Then I'd have to have sex and I don't like sex.
translation.es: Tendría que tener sexo,y no me gusta el sexo.

translation.en: -Oh, my God, you don't like sex? -[scoffs]

translation.es: - A mí me encanta el sexo.- Sí, lo sabemos.

translation.en: We saw you on the boat going behind the bar
translation.es: Te vimos escabullirte en el barco

translation.en: why is it still not acceptable for women to enjoy sex just like men?
translation.es: ¿Por qué las mujeres no podemosdisfrutar del sexo como los hombres?
Yo no me opongo en absoluto.

translation.en: I didn't see, but from what I've heard of that barista guy,
translation.es: Yo no lo vi,pero por lo que dicen de ese barista,

translation.en: I think even I would have made an exception for him.
translation.es: hasta yo habría hecho una excepción.

translation.en: Oh, sweet little thing. Oh, my darling.
Oh, uh. Come here, come on, my darling.
I guess it doesn't like to be touched, huh?
translation.es: No debe gustarle que la toquen.

translation.en: Does anybody know how many planets there are?
No, no, no, there are eight.
Then there is, of course, Uranus.
There's Jupiter and Neptune, so it's eight.
No, no, no. Pluto was thrown out.
The International Astronomic Union decided in 2006
that Pluto was no longer officially regarded as a planet.
translation.es: que a Plutónya no se lo consideraría un planeta.

translation.en: -[bell chimes] -One moment you're a family and the next…
[in Dutch] Ah, sorry. This isn't going to work.
translation.es: Lo siento. Esto no va a funcionar.

translation.en: Hi, I'm having lots of fun at my party and--
translation.es: Hola, me estoy divirtiendo muchoen mi fiesta y…

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Keep your hands off her!
Jens is expecting you for a one-on-one.
translation.es: Jens te espera para hablar a solas.

translation.en: I'm really sorry, but I'm leaving.
translation.es: Lo siento mucho, pero me iré.

translation.en: Thank you very much for your hospitality. I really appreciate it, but, um…
translation.es: Gracias por su hospitalidad.Les agradezco mucho, pero…
- No puedo hacer esto.- Está bien.

translation.en: Jens is waiting for you at the coffee bar down the street.
translation.es: Jens te esperaen la cafetería calle abajo.

translation.en: Maybe you could have a cappuccino.

translation.es: No puedes hacer que me quede.

translation.en: As long as it rumbles, it won't erupt.
This is so much better than charcoal water.
translation.es: Mucho más rico que el agua de carbón.

translation.en: Oh, I thought coffee is poison.
translation.es: Creí que el café era veneno.

translation.en: [inhales] One day at a time, right?
Okay, shouldn't you ask me things then?
About, I don't know, my lonely childhood or why I blew up my marriage?
translation.es: No sé, ¿sobre mi infancia solitariao por qué arruiné mi matrimonio?

translation.en: Well, I thought we were having a one-on-one.
translation.es: Pensé que íbamos a hablar a solas.

translation.en: Listen, you don't come across as someone who likes to share things.
translation.es: No pareces alguiena quien le guste compartir cosas.

translation.en: Why do you hate yourself so much?
I want you to pair up and lie on top of each other.
translation.es: Pónganse de a dos,uno acostado sobre el otro.

translation.en: Adela, why don't you pair up with Matteo?
And Eva, please team up with Max.
-Shall we pair? -[Hans] Want to pair up?
Oh, you should stay away from him.
You don't need another asshole in your life.
translation.es: No necesitas otro idiota en tu vida.

translation.en: -[in Dutch] Shall we share a mat together? -Um…
[grunts] I'm not sure this is entirely hygienic.
translation.es: No sé si esto es muy higiénico.
Por favor, traten de ser sinceros.

translation.en: You're lying on top of another human being
who's just as scared and vulnerable as you are.
translation.es: que está tan asustadoy es tan vulnerable como ustedes.

translation.en: [in Dutch] Okay, this isn't going to work.
It's driving me crazy, do you understand?
-What's wrong? -I just can't, I, I, I… Don't touch me.
translation.es: - ¿Qué pasa?- No puedo… No me toques.

translation.en: Why is it so hard for you to be close to another man?
translation.es: ¿Por qué te cuesta tantoestar cerca de otro hombre?

translation.en: I've had enough of this cheap bullshit nonsense, okay?
translation.es: Ya me cansé de esta tontería barata.

translation.en: -[Jens] Okay, give it to me. -Fuck off, Jens!
translation.es: - Eso es.- ¡Vete a la mierda, Jens!

translation.en: [Jens] Yes, give me the anger, Hans!
-You just leave me be, okay? -Come here.
Yeah, come on! Give it to me! Yes!
Give it to me, come on!
Let it all out! Come on!
Go for it, come on! Yes!
This is the root of your pain.
translation.es: Esta es la raíz de tu dolor.

translation.en: Did you lead the life you wanted?
I know this can be painful, but it's important.
translation.es: Sé que esto puede ser doloroso,pero es importante.
La vida no es un ensayo.

translation.en: when they wanted a few models at their party…
translation.es: cuando querían tener modelos en su fiesta…

translation.en: Who got paid a lot of money in exchange for partying.
translation.es: A quienes les pagaban mucho dineroa cambio de diversión.

translation.en: One of them was really young.
translation.es: Una de ellas era muy joven.

translation.en: [Jens] We have a limited amount of time here on Earth.
translation.es: Nuestro tiempo en la Tierra es limitado.

translation.en: How do you want to spend it?
Who do you want to spend it with?
Who do you want to be?
[Diane] Does she talk to you, your daughter?
She's angry with me now, so…
translation.es: Ahora está enojada conmigo, así que…
Está bien que se enoje. "La ira es buena".

translation.en: I was so proud of him, my son.
He was so smart and handsome and off to Cambridge.
translation.es: Muy inteligente y apuesto,se fue a Cambridge.

translation.en: I just missed all the signs.
and you've found what you're looking for…
translation.es: cuando hayan encontrado lo que buscaban,

translation.en: [Harold] Come here, darling. Come on, come on, don't be afraid.
translation.es: Ven aquí, pequeña. Vamos, no tengas miedo.

translation.en: [Harold] I only want to help you.
Yeah, come on, come on. Don't be afraid.

translation.es: ¿Qué te pareció el día de ayer?

translation.en: Yeah, okay. Thank you so much.
I'm so sorry, Jens, I had a little trouble turning back to the light.
translation.es: Lo siento mucho, Jens,me costó un poco volver a salir.

translation.en: You all paid a lot of money for this week and made a long journey to get here.
translation.es: Pagaron mucho por esta semanay viajaron desde lejos para venir.

translation.en: So tell me, why are you here?
[Hans] A friend of mine signed me up.
You could be eating lobster on the French Riviera.
translation.es: Podrías estar comiendo langostaen la Costa Azul.

translation.en: Why did you divorce your husband?
-[laughs] -[Jens] Why did you marry a dick?
translation.es: ¿Por qué te casaste con un idiota?

translation.en: Why are you in a dysfunctional relationship
with your parents and your daughter?
translation.es: con tus padres y con tu hija?

translation.en: -I never said that. -Why do you drink too much?
translation.es: - Yo no dije eso.- ¿Por qué bebes tanto?

translation.en: -Sorry, I find this a bit-- -And the most important question of all.
translation.es: - Perdón, esto es algo…- La pregunta más importante.

translation.en: Why did you let your entire life be determined by the fact
translation.es: ¿Por qué dejaste que tu vidaestuviera definida por el hecho

translation.en: I don't know what you're talking about.
You don't feel there's a connection?
A connection? A connection to what?
To what's happening to you right now.
translation.es: Con lo que te pasa ahora.

translation.en: [in Dutch] Jesus, what a load of crap.
I don't see the point in dragging up old shit from,
translation.es: no sé qué sentido tienetraer a cuento cosas de,

translation.en: I don't know, like 25 years ago!
[Jens] Have you talked to Hans about this?
Maybe you guys can help each other.
If you don't act and do something, your lives will be ruined by this.
translation.es: Si no hacen algo,esto les arruinará la vida.

translation.en: You'll steal your own chance of happiness
translation.es: Se negarán la oportunidad de ser felices

translation.en: and fuck up the most important relationships in your lives.
translation.es: y arruinarán las relacionesmás importantes de sus vidas.

translation.en: Including the ones with your children.
[whispering in Dutch] When was your last confession, my child?
translation.es: ¿Cuándo fue tu última confesión, hijo mío?

translation.en: But he didn't really know how to deal with it.
"If you just don't think about it for long enough…
translation.es: Que si no pensaba mucho en eso…

translation.en: it will be like it never happened."
translation.es: sería como si nunca hubiera sucedido.

translation.en: I don't know how to do it.
[in English] Everyone, this is a role play.
translation.es: Esto es un juego de roles.

translation.en: Hans is your ex-husband and Helene is you.
translation.es: Hans es tu exesposo y Helene eres tú.

translation.en: I tried so hard to reach out to you.
translation.es: Me esforcé mucho por hablar contigo.

translation.en: But you just… You just close me down. You push me away.
translation.es: Pero tú no me dejas. Me alejas.

translation.en: No, I don't think you wanted to hear what I had to say, so--
translation.es: Creía que no querías oírlo que tenía para decir, así que…

translation.en: But you don't know that that was true.
And I would have done anything, I would have done anything to save you.
translation.es: Y habría hecho cualquier cosa.Habría hecho lo que fuera para salvarte.

translation.en: You actually never gave me a chance.
You closed me down. You pushed me away.
I don't think you wanted to hear what I had to say.
translation.es: Creo que no querías oírlo que tenía para decir.

translation.en: didn't you notice a change in your daughter?
translation.es: ¿no notaste un cambio en tu hija?

translation.en: I… I… I don't know why…
-I'm sorry, guys, I just can't do this. -What is it, Harold?
I don't know how this works, I…
translation.es: No sé cómo funciona esto. Yo…

translation.en: I don't know anything about families.
It was always just me and my mother, and…
translation.es: Siempre fuimos solo mi madre y yo, y…
Y a ella no le gustaban los niños.

translation.en: It's not about doing things right or wrong.
translation.es: No se trata de hacer las cosas bien o mal.

translation.en: and see where it leads you.
Didn't you feel something had happened to your daughter?
translation.es: ¿No sentisteque a tu hija le había pasado algo?

translation.en: I… I… I think I did notice…
But I… I didn't… I didn't want to acknowledge it.
I couldn't bear that someone had taken
translation.es: No podía soportarque alguien le hubiera quitado…

translation.en: all the joy out of my little girl.
translation.es: toda la alegría a mi niña.

translation.en: Of what happened to your child.
translation.es: por lo que le había pasado.

translation.en: Even if this wasn't his fault.
translation.es: Aunque no fuera culpa de él.

translation.en: You were just so caught up in your own shame,
translation.es: Estabas tan absortoen tu propia vergüenza,

translation.en: you couldn't be there for her.
I need you to talk to Sara.
What do you want to say to her?
[in Dutch] You should have told me, Sara.
[Karel] Maybe everything would have been different.
Maybe we'd have had a chance.
Oh God, I don't… Sorry, what's going on? I don't… Who's he?
translation.es: Cielos, yo no… ¿Qué es esto? ¿Quién es él?
No me preguntes a mí. Pregúntale a él.

translation.en: -Oh, I'm the guy who raped your daughter. -[Helene] No, you were not invited.
translation.es: - Soy el que violó a su hija.- No, no estás invitado.

translation.en: I don't think I want this, okay?
translation.es: Creo que no quiero hacer esto, ¿sí?

translation.en: -I don't think I want it. -Want to stop?
No, I don't want him here.
-I'm not going to do this, Jens, I'm, uh… -Do what?
translation.es: - No voy a hacer esto, yo…- ¿Hacer qué?

translation.en: [Hans] I'm just not even going to try and have a conversation with a rapist.
translation.es: Ni siquiera intentaré hablarde forma civilizada con un violador.

translation.en: You don't interest me in the slightest. [laughs]
But I'd like to meet your daughter.
translation.es: Pero me gustaría conocer a tu hija.

translation.en: -[in Dutch] No, don't sit with him. -Jesus, Mom.
translation.es: - No, no te sientes con él.- Cielos, mamá.

translation.en: I'm only trying to protect you, okay?
[Sara] But sweetheart, I love you. I love you so much.
translation.es: Cariño, te quiero. Te quiero muchísimo.

translation.en: It doesn't seem like it at all.
-Can I talk to Sofie? -[man] Where are you?
-I tried calling but she won't pick up. -[man] What do you expect?
translation.es: - La llamé, pero no contesta.- ¿Qué esperas?

translation.en: [Sofie] I don't want to talk to her.
[Helene] I… I… I… I just don't understand. Why can't I be Sara anymore?
translation.es: No entiendo.¿Por qué ya no puedo ser Sara?

translation.en: I… I thought it went very, very well today.
translation.es: Creo que lo de hoy salió muy bien.

translation.en: Absolutely. You've been a great help.
translation.es: Claro que sí. Has ayudado mucho.

translation.en: For this reenactment, you play the rapist of Sara.
translation.es: Para esta recreación,tú serás el violador de Sara.

translation.en: A sweet drink with the smell of banana.
translation.es: Una bebida dulce con olor a banana.

translation.en: And you've already had too much so you feel a bit dizzy.
You enjoy the music. You love to dance.
translation.es: Disfrutas la música. Te encanta bailar.

translation.en: And all the guys are watching you because you're so…
translation.es: Y todos los chicos te miranporque eres muy…

translation.en: You're so pure and incredibly beautiful.
translation.es: Eres muy pura e increíblemente hermosa.

translation.en: Sorry, I think we should stop.
Because I don't think this is good for Violet.
translation.es: Creo que esto no es bueno para Violet.

translation.en: -You think you can do this, Violet? -Yes.
If you change your mind, please, just let us know. Okay?
translation.es: Si cambias de parecer, dinos. ¿De acuerdo?

translation.en: You've had too much so you feel a bit dizzy.
You go after her and ask if she's alright.
translation.es: Vas tras ella y le preguntas si está bien.

translation.en: [Sara in English] And you both sit down.
[in English] Then you push her to the ground.
translation.es: Y la empujas contra el suelo.

translation.en: -[Hans] I-- -You push her to the ground.
translation.es: - Yo…- La empujas contra el suelo.

translation.en: And you're whispering, "Maybe someone is coming."
[in English] And then you rip off her skirt,
translation.es: Y luego le arrancas la falda,

translation.en: swing it around and throw it away.
[in Dutch] You want this just as bad as I do.
[Hans in English] Hey, don't cry. Don't cry. It was just a joke, okay?
translation.es: Oye, no llores. Fue solo una broma, ¿sí?

translation.en: It was just a… I'll get it back. I'll get it back.
translation.es: Fue solo una… Te la traeré.

translation.en: Hey, it was just a joke.
[laughing] It's a joke, I'll get it back right away.
translation.es: Es una broma, te la traeré.

translation.en: I think you want something else.
[in English] And then he turns you around.
And he pulls off your underwear.
translation.es: Y te quita la ropa interior.

translation.en: Okay, okay, I… I think we… we should stop. I've… I've seen enough.
[Jens] None of this was your fault.
translation.es: Nada de esto fue tu culpa.

translation.en: Vattene! Questa è la mia proprietà. Ancora qua sei. -Pietro, please. -Chiamo la polizia.
-I want to say I'm sorry. -Puttana. Tu devi pagare…
This is for you, for making such a mess. I'm really sorry, okay?
translation.es: Esto es para usted,por el desastre que hice. Lo siento mucho.

translation.en: You should dance as well. Come on, come on.
I loved my mother, but she didn't even like me!
translation.es: ¡Yo amaba a mi madre,pero ella no me quería!

translation.en: But I got all her money, so I win!
translation.es: Pero me quedécon todo su dinero, ¡gané yo!

translation.en: -Calma, calma. -Take it easy. Take it easy, take it easy.
-Oh! -No, no, no. You keep him back.
Okay, okay. We'll take you home.
[Harold] Sara, what are we going to do if the volcano erupts?
translation.es: Sara, ¿qué vamos a hacersi el volcán entra en erupción?

translation.en: I'd try to get some sleep, Harold, okay?
Hey, sweetie, it's gonna be okay.
[Sofie] It was the worst birthday ever.
translation.es: Fue el peor cumpleaños del mundo.

translation.en: -But there's nothing you can do now. -I know.
translation.es: - Ya no puedes hacer nada.- Lo sé.

translation.en: Sweetheart, when I'm home I need to tell you about my past.
translation.es: Cuando vuelva,necesito contarte sobre mi pasado.

translation.en: -[Hans] Ciao! Grazie. -[Sara] Thank you so much!
Don't worry, it's not what you think.
translation.es: Tranquila, no es lo que crees.

translation.en: Will you come to Holland and visit me?
